meanings.definition: A person who commits a crime.
meanings.sent1: The perpetrator was caught stealing from the store.
meanings.sent2: The police are searching for the perpetrator of the robbery.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky perpetrator tried to steal cookies from the jar.
meanings.sent4: The perpetrator of the crime left behind a trail of evidence.
meanings.sent5: The perpetrator's face was captured on the security camera.

meanings.definition: One who carries out an action or makes something happen.
meanings.sent1: The perpetrator of the prank remained unknown.
meanings.sent2: The team celebrated the perpetrator of the winning goal.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous perpetrator played a trick on his friend.
meanings.sent4: The perpetrator of change can sometimes face resistance.
meanings.sent5: The perpetrator of the plan executed it flawlessly.
